channel.title: gathering on Zinzy's website
channel.description: Recent content in gathering on Zinzy's website

item.title: Film club S01E01
item.description: Yesterday, I attended the very first gathering of FC de Filmfanaten, a brand-new film club that my friend Jolien started. There were four of us, and we discussed the movie I was proud to have suggested: [[Talk To Me|Talk To Me]]. I love speaking about films with others, and particularly with this diverse group of people. Everyone brought a completely unique perspective to the film, one brought film industry insights while the other had thoughtful ideas that I hadn’t considered.
